channel.title: BaaS on CEO Playbook
channel.description: Recent content in BaaS on CEO Playbook

item.title: xpanse
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: API-first platform that standardizes and aggregates financial services, allowing developers, banks, and fintechs to launch banking, identity, and payment products with a single integration.

item.title: i2i
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Leveraging a blockchain based automated clearing house and Peso denominated stablecoin, the i2i platform connects rural banks and MSMEs to the national financial grid.
